data.text:
*** SERVICE INFO *** 
Air Dolomiti temporarily discontinues its regular flight operations starting March 18th to April 19th 2020. 
As always, we will take care of you. We await you and we will welcome you back again with a smile, ready for a new take-off. https://t.co/eUsJnOVDRP
@TurismoItaliaNw #WeAreInThisTogether
@mt_delre ❤ #WeAreInThisTogether

A Lufthansa flight containing 1500 medical suits to deal with the Coronavirus emergency has landed in Milan.
Air Dolomiti has coordinated the transport operation, maintaining contact with the Italian Embassy in Berlin. #WeAreInThisTogether https://t.co/dxnZWKsjGY

data.text: @aviation_report Together we are stronger! 💪

@Renato29732569 A tal proposito, invece, ci stiamo impegnando a garantire un livello di servizio adeguato nonostante la riduzione dei voli e a fornire assistenza ai passeggeri che hanno subito un’irregolarità. Buona giornata, Veronika 1/2

@Renato29732569 Gentile Renato, ci dispiace del feedback negativo e comprendiamo la natura dell’emergenza. Di fatto l’andamento dei prezzi è dinamico e le tariffe più competitive sono disponibili acquistando con largo anticipo e non hanno nulla a che fare con l’emergenza COVID-19

data.text: @ma15233898 Hi Sara, I believe I have answered to your request in another thread. have a nice day, Veronika
@ma15233898 We hope for your understanding and remain at your disposal for further info. Warmly greetings, Veronika 1/4

@ma15233898 We would like to apologize for this inconvenience and inform you that all Lufthansa Group Airlines are trying to accommodate our passengers’ needs by applying a flexible rebooking policy. 1/3

data.text: @ma15233898 However, we can never be 100% sure until the very departure date due to the extremely rapidly changing circumstances. 1/2
@ma15233898 Dear Sara, if your flight is confirmed one day before the planned departure, it is very likely that it will be operated on the following day. 1/1

@ma15233898 Dear Sara,
right now there is a flight from Munich to Bari on the 20th of March scheduled as follows:
EN8218 09:45 Munich International (MUC) - 11:20 Palese (BRI) 
Due to the exceptional circumstances, our flight schedule may be subject to last minute changes, we t

@ma15233898 Dear Sara,

Would you be able to give us some additional details concerning your flights? If you have a booking code or a ticket number we can check your flight status.

thank you in advance,
Veronika

@ma15233898 Dear Sara,

thank you for getting in touch.
Can you please provide us with your ticket number or booking code? We will check your flight status accordingly.
thank you in advance.

Veronika

@BLQairport @alice_van_pelt @ItalyMFA @Ambasciataita @Alitalia @lufthansa Buongiorno Alice, l'alternativa più veloce (4h50) è tuttavia quella di volare da Londra Heathrow (LHR) a Monaco di Baviera (MUC) con @lufthansa e proseguire su Pisa (PSA) con noi @Air_Dolomiti

data.text: The safety and health of our passengers and staff have always been our priority. For precautionary reasons and to reduce the possible spread of coronavirus, the onboard service is temporarily suspended. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

data.text:
Air Dolomiti announces a flight cancellation for the month of April 
https://t.co/LZYVn1rRes

@LisaKlinowski Dear Lisa,
after an internal check we have sent you an answer by private message.
Don't hesitate to contact us for further information.
With our kindest regards

@GiuPesce Gli aeromobili sono stati dotati di mascherine, guanti monouso per gli equipaggi, salviette igienizzanti per equipaggi e passeggeri. Il personale è inoltre formato per la gestione di situazioni critiche e lavora secondo le normative vigenti.

@GiuPesce Gentile Giuseppe, Air Dolomiti ha già provveduto ad effettuare numerose cancellazioni al fine di garantire un minimo di operatività per chi ha esigenze di spostarsi per motivi di lavoro o gravi necessità. La priorità rimane comunque la tutela dei dipendenti e dei passeg

@LisaKlinowski Dear Lisa,
many thanks for your request and for all the details.
We'll check internally coming back to you in a short time.
With our kindest regards

@LisaKlinowski Dear Lisa,
we understand your desease. Could you please send us by private message your PNR, ticket or booking number?
We would be very glad to help you.
With our kindest regards
Vanessa

@MalteRuths Dear Malte,
can we help you?
No issues with booking engine but please advise if you are still experiencing problems with our site.
With our kindest regards
Vanessa

@BelliniAle1986 Dear Alessandro,
what we can do, we do it willingly. Unfortunately, we cannot help you further even if we understand your disappointment.
We hope you can resolve the matter as soon as possible.
With our best regards
Vanessa

@BelliniAle1986 Dear Aessandro,
sorry to keep you waiting.
You should contact the airline with which you leave Singapore directly.
They should tell you what are the restrictions applied.
Please contact us for any further need.
With our kindest regards
Vanessa
@BelliniAle1986 Just replied to your DM!😉
@LouiseLiterally Hi Louise, thanks for reaching out and sending us all your detail via DM. Should you need any further info, please do not hesitate to contact us. BR/Michaela
@BelliniAle1986 Hi Alessandro, thanks for contacting us here! Could you please send us your PNR via DM? We'll get back to you as soon as possible. BR/Michaela
@TheMartinMarr Thanks for sharing it! Great pic! 👍

@dermitchie @lufthansa @FlySWISS We are sorry to hear this, but really appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. Would you mind giving us more details about your experience per DM? Your feedback will help us get better. BR/Michaela

data.text: @TheDiningFeed Hi! Could you please send us a DM with your PNR? We'll forward your message to the crew and let you know. There's always a good reason! BR/Michaela

@JackMcGrath Hi Jack, thank you so much for your message. We've forwarded it to the department in charge. Would you please send us your flight date and number, to pass your compliments on to our colleagues? BR/Michaela
How many planes take off across the world every day? See if you can guess... Then compare your answer with the one you'll find in today's article on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/Oatgeg04Bx
@marymaryatl Sure! We're happy to help! 😊
@robertpdavis68 Hi Robert, we are very sorry for our delayed response. Could you please confirm that you are referring to FB ID 33529920? Looking forward to hearing from you soon. BR/Michaela

data.text:
Whether you arrive on foot, by bike or even running, the Monastery of San Michele in Bosco is a must-see stop in #Bologna! From up there, enjoy taking in the skyline of Bologna, a city that adores being admired ❤️ #AlternativeGuide 
https://t.co/nHFUbaLT4A https://t.co/x6IytkgjlP
#AirDolomiti apre a #Firenze un nuovo centro di manutenzione, in primavera inaugurerà una nuova base tecnica all’Amerigo Vespucci https://t.co/idapWCgwBF https://t.co/YFkfhBw70j
@Nazten Hello Philip, can you please try to DM us now?
#AirDolomiti apre a #Firenze un nuovo centro di manutenzione, in primavera inaugurerà una nuova base tecnica all’Amerigo Vespucci https://t.co/idapWCgwBF

If you're in #Verona, you have the perfect excuse to take refuge in the Third Circle of Hell, reserved for the gluttonous. Verona will kidnap your taste buds and spoil them with local flavours. Find out our #top5 places to eat with #AlternativeGuide: https://t.co/qghzaC8NLT https://t.co/U2YrkGLf25

You'll see them all the time around #Bavaria. Hoisted on May 1st each year and a symbol of fertility and good luck, a #Maibaum looks a bit like an English #Maypole. The town of #Aying is home to the tallest one in Europe. #AlternativeGuide #Munich  https://t.co/oS2So8IGC7 https://t.co/mr4EXl6lx9

Want to surprise your partner? 😎 Book an alternative #weekend in #Florence.
First stop: #BENè spa in Villa Cora , then dinner at the #Cibrèo restaurant in the stands of the Teatro del Sale. Follow our #AlternativeGuide tips: https://t.co/0uiDHGQr3A https://t.co/ibZVXWglZj

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text: Our website https://t.co/eUsJnPdeJn is currently unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. It will be back online on Jan 1st 2020. For urgent matter, please call us +39 045 2886140 or +49 089 97580497 from Germany by 8 pm. We apologize for the inconvenience. #serviceinfo

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On Jan 1 and 6 our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed. We will be back online on Jan 2 and 3. Our Sales Center will also be there on Jan 4 and 5 from 9 am to 5 pm! We wish you all a great #NewYear2020!

data.text: @TuukkaYlaAnt @lufthansa Hi, we are truly sorry about it and totally understand your disappointment. Would you be so kind to send us your PNR or ticket number via Direct Message? We'll look into this and get back to you as soon as possible. Best regards, Michaela

data.text:
On Dec 25 and 26 our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed.
We will be back online on Dec 27, 30 and 31. Our Sales Center will be there also on Dec 28 and 29 from 9 am to 5 pm. We wish you a Merry Christmas & a Happy New Year! ♥️ https://t.co/o6w0Yeap12

@HollyMo95426903 Terribly sorry to read that and totally understand your point, as for us, safety is always top priority. In order to assist you could you please send us, via DM as sensitive data, more details such as passenger name, email address, flight number and day? BR/Laure
